section.title: Introduction
section.para: &suse; offers several general-purpose &bci;s that are intended as deployment targets or as foundations for creating customized images: BCI-Base, &bcia;-Minimal, &bcia;-Micro, and &bcia;-BusyBox. These images share the common &slsa; base, and none of them ship with a specific language or an application stack. All images feature the RPM database (even if the specific image does not include the RPM package manager) that can be used to verify the provenance of every file in the image. Each image includes the &slsa; certificate bundle, which allows the deployed applications to use the system's certificates to verify TLS connections.
